item.title: An Introduction to RSA
item.description: In order to understand why this next part works, we need to understand a little about the method used to encrypt the message. In public key cryptography, users generate a public and private keypair. The public key is used to encrypt a message and the private key is used to decrypt a message. The public key is meant to be shared with everyone that intends on encrypting a message and sending it to the owner of the public key.
